org.dmd.dmc.rules
Class RuleCollection<I extends RuleIF>

java.lang.Object
  org.dmd.dmc.rules.RuleCollection<I>
Type Parameters:
I - an interface that extends RuleIF
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributeRuleCollection, ClassRuleCollection
public abstract class RuleCollection<I extends RuleIF>
extends java.lang.Object

The RuleCollection maintains a collection of rule instances on the basis of the RuleKey associated with the rule instance.

          Creates a new RuleCollection.

Constructor Detail

RuleCollection

public RuleCollection()
Creates a new RuleCollection.

Method Detail

addRule

public abstract void addRule(RuleIF rule)
Attempts to add a single rule instance to the collection. Whether or not the rule is actually added will depend on whether or not the rule instance is a match for this rule collection.

The generated derived class will check to see if this rule is of the type specified () for this collection.

Parameters:
rule - the rule to be added.

addRules

public void addRules(java.util.Iterator<RuleIF> rules)
Attempts to add the rules to this collection. The ones that match this collection's interface will be added.

Parameters:
rules - the rules (usually from a schema)

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
